name: Black Panther
description: King T'Challa is the leader of Wakanda, a technologically advanced nation that houses rich deposits of the precious metal vibranium. As Black Panther, T'Challa connects to the panther god Bast by eating a special heart-shaped herb, thereby gaining superhuman abilities. T'Challa uses these powers to protect Wakanda and the world from those who would seek it harm.
